clues.text: It might "amuse" you to know that this bone extends from the shoulder to the elbow

rounds.comments: (Alex: The correct response will begin with the letter A, B, or C, or perhaps all three.)

clues.text: The most popular type of this fruity dessert is Apple Brown

rounds.text: Henry Hudson named this island for the Dutch legislature
